353 #ifdef MODULE_THREAD
354 #ifdef MODULE_STATIC
355 #define MODULE_MAIN(X) \
356  static std::shared_ptr<vistle::Module> newModuleInstance(const std::string &name, int moduleId, mpi::communicator comm) { \
357  vistle::Module::setup("dummy shm", moduleId, comm.rank()); \
358  return std::shared_ptr<X>(new X(name, moduleId, comm)); \
359  } \
360  static vistle::ModuleRegistry::RegisterClass registerModule(VISTLE_MODULE_NAME, newModuleInstance);
361 #else
362 #define MODULE_MAIN(X) \
363  static std::shared_ptr<vistle::Module> newModuleInstance(const std::string &name, int moduleId, mpi::communicator comm) { \
364  vistle::Module::setup("dummy shm", moduleId, comm.rank()); \
365  return std::shared_ptr<X>(new X(name, moduleId, comm)); \
366  } \
367  BOOST_DLL_ALIAS(newModuleInstance, newModule);
368 #endif
369 
370 #define MODULE_DEBUG(X)
371 #else
372 // MPI_THREAD_FUNNELED is sufficient, but apparantly not provided by the CentOS build of MVAPICH2
373 #define MODULE_MAIN(X) \
374  int main(int argc, char **argv) { \
375  int provided = MPI_THREAD_SINGLE; \
376  MPI_Init_thread(&argc, &argv, MPI_THREAD_FUNNELED, &provided); \
377  if (provided == MPI_THREAD_SINGLE) { \
378  std::cerr << "no thread support in MPI, continuing anyway" << std::endl; \
379  } \
380  vistle::registerTypes(); \
381  int rank=-1, size=-1; \
382  std::string shmname; \
383  try { \
384  if (argc != 4) { \
385  std::cerr << "module requires exactly 4 parameters" << std::endl; \
386  MPI_Finalize(); \
387  exit(1); \
388  } \
389  MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &rank); \
390  MPI_Comm_size(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &size); \
391  shmname = argv[1]; \
392  const std::string name = argv[2]; \
393  int moduleID = atoi(argv[3]); \
394  vistle::Module::setup(shmname, moduleID, rank); \
395  { \
396  X module(name, moduleID, mpi::communicator()); \
397  module.eventLoop(); \
398  } \
399  MPI_Barrier(MPI_COMM_WORLD); \
400  } catch(vistle::exception &e) { \
401  std::cerr << "[" << rank << "/" << size << "]: fatal exception: " << e.what() << std::endl; \
402  std::cerr << " info: " << e.info() << std::endl; \
403  std::cerr << e.where() << std::endl; \
404  MPI_Finalize(); \
405  exit(1); \
406  } catch(std::exception &e) { \
407  std::cerr << "[" << rank << "/" << size << "]: fatal exception: " << e.what() << std::endl; \
408  MPI_Finalize(); \
409  exit(1); \
410  } \
411  MPI_Finalize(); \
412  return 0; \
413  }
414 
415 #ifdef NDEBUG
416 #define MODULE_DEBUG(X)
417 #else
418 #define MODULE_DEBUG(X) \
419  std::cerr << #X << ": PID " << get_process_handle() << std::endl; \
420  std::cerr << " attach debugger within 10 s" << std::endl; \
421  sleep(10); \
422  std::cerr << " continuing..." << std::endl;
423 #endif
424 #endif
425

427 #include "module_impl.h"
428 #endif
429 #endif
